action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Clean Energy Jobs Act of 2022
This bill directs the Department of Energy, in consultation with the Department of Labor and the Department of Education, to establish a comprehensive nationwide program to improve education and workforce development for jobs in energy-related industries, with emphasis on increasing the number of skilled individuals from underrepresented groups trained to work in those jobs.
